quotes.quote: Even bad men love their mamas.
Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
My mama taught me that anything worth doing in life should be a little scary.
Mama was crying, and the rain made it seem as if the whole world was crying.
A mother's love liberates.
All mothers are working mothers.
Mother's love outlives everything.
A Mother is the heart of the home.
A mother is God's deputy on earth.
We have nothing to fear but our mothers.
Mothers are the most instinctive philosophers.
Being a mother makes everything more urgent.
The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom.
An ounce of mother is worth a pound of clergy.
A mother who is really a mother is never free.
Mothers reflect God's loving presence on earth.
One good mother is worth a hundred schoolmasters.
A mother is a mother still, The holiest thing alive.
The moment a child is born, the mother is also born. She never existed before. The woman existed, but the mother, never. A mother is something absolutely new.
All mothers have intuition. The great ones have radar.
Being a mother is an attitude, not a biological relation.
A mother is a child's first looking glass into the world.
Being a mother is magical.
Mother's love grows by giving.
A good mother is irreplaceable.
A mother is the truest friend we have.
Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
Mothers can get weaned as well as babies.
The mother's kiss is the sweetest thing ever.
Mothers got a hard road to travel, believe me.
